    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_78791</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Common structural feature in aspirin, 2-hydroxybenzoic acid and salicin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geläufiges strukturelles Merkmal im aspirin, in 
der Säure 2-hydroxybenzoic und im salicin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dispositif structural commun dans l'aspirin, 
l'acide 2-hydroxybenzoic et le salicin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Característica estrutural comum no aspirin, no 
ácido 2-hydroxybenzoic e no salicin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratteristica strutturale comune in aspirin, in 
acido 2-hydroxybenzoic ed in salicin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινό δομικό χαρακτηριστικό γνώρισμα στο aspirin, 
το 2-χυδροξυψενζοηθ οξύ και το salicin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Característica estructural común en aspirin, el
ácido 2-hydroxybenzoic y el salicin</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the common structural feature, shaded blue, in the structures of aspirin, 2-hydroxybenzoic acid and salicin. This explains the similar pharmacological activity these drugs have in the body.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">2-hydroxybenzoic acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">aspirin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fever</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pain killers</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pharmacological activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pharmacophore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">salicin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">salicylic acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">structural feature</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das geläufige strukturelle 
Merkmal, das schattierte Blau, in den Strukturen von aspirin, die 
Säure 2-hydroxybenzoic und das salicin. Dieses erklärt die 
ähnliche pharmakologische Aktivität, die diese Drogen im Körper 
haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le dispositif 
structural commun, le bleu ombragé, dans les structures de l'aspirin,
l'acide 2-hydroxybenzoic et le salicin. Ceci explique 
l'activité pharmacologique semblable que ces drogues ont dans le 
corps.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a característica 
estrutural comum, o azul protegido, nas estruturas do aspirin, o 
ácido 2-hydroxybenzoic e o salicin. Isto explica a atividade 
que pharmacological similar estas drogas têm no corpo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la caratteristica 
strutturale comune, l'azzurro protetto, nelle strutture del aspirin, 
l'acido 2-hydroxybenzoic ed il salicin. Ciò spiega l'attività 
che farmacologica analoga queste droghe hanno nel corpo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το κοινό δομικό 
χαρακτηριστικό γνώρισμα, το σκιασμένο μπλε, στις δομές του 
aspirin, το 2-χυδροξυψενζοηθ οξύ και salicin. Αυτό 
εξηγεί την παρόμοια φαρμακολογική δραστηριότητα που αυτά τα 
φάρμακα αναπτύσσουν στο σώμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la característica 
estructural común, el azul sombreado, en las estructuras del aspirin,
el ácido 2-hydroxybenzoic y el salicin. Esto explica la 
actividad farmacológica similar que estas drogas tienen en el cuerpo.</string>
          </description>
